page.title: 13Interview-Mrs. Prosser
page.content: One of the parents of Penygawsi Primary School practises{alternative {medicine}this is what she says about it {"Orthodox medicine}treats symptoms but{holistic}medicine treats the whole person; body, mind and soul.{Touch {for Health}(T.F.H.) is a combination of chiropractice(working to straighten the spine),kinesiology (muscle toning and balancing), acupressure(working with touch on the body's energy channels) and nutrition. T.F.H. consists of a series of muscle tests, the results of which idicate free flow or blockages of energy. A blockage can be corrected by firm massage on certain neurolymphatic points or by holding neuro vascular points on the head. I use T.F.H. to release energy blockages, to tone weak muscles, to alleviate pain and to test for allergies."
